installationchecker.installation.incorre: Stadew Valley Expanded似乎安装不正确。
installationchecker.missing.mods: 没能检测到Stadew Valley Expanded所需要的模组……
installationchecker.missing.mods.cont: 请下载，或确保已正确安装以下内容：
installationchecker.outdated.mods: 检测到在Stadew Valley Expanded中使用的模组版本已过时……
installationchecker.outdated.mods.cont: 请在进行游戏前，更新以下内容：
installationchecker.orphaned.mods: 找不到以下这些需要的前置模组，或是它们
installationchecker.orphaned.mods.cont: 没有安装，又或者缺少依赖的前置。请检查以下内容：
installationchecker.smapi.outdated: SMAPI已经过时了！请尽快更新！
installationchecker.component.missing:
There seems to be an issue with your Stadew Valley Expanded installation.
Please visit https://smapi.io/log and follow the instructions on that site to upload your log.
Scroll to the top of the page and read the red text to identify the errors.
installationchecker.help.message: 如果需要帮助，请访问SVE的Discord主页！https://discord.gg/TBevpV28
installationchecker.success: 安装检查已完成。一切看起来都很好！
